alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls and southwestern Jerome Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hollister, or 14 miles south of Twin Falls, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hollister around 520 PM MDT. Twin Falls and Magic Valley Regional Airport around 530 PM MDT. Kimberly around 540 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
